trans-unit.source: Placement constraints let you configure the service to run only on nodes with specific (arbitrary) metadata set, and cause the deployment to fail if appropriate nodes do not exist. For instance, you can specify that your service should only run on nodes where an arbitrary label pci_compliant is set to true.
trans-unit.target: 放置约束使您可以将服务配置为仅在具有特定（任意）元数据集的节点上运行，并且如果不存在适当的节点，则会导致部署失败。例如，您可以指定服务仅应在任意标签 pci_compliant 设置为 true 的节点上运行。

trans-unit.source: Placement preferences let you apply an arbitrary label with a range of values to each node, and spread your service’s tasks across those nodes using an algorithm. Currently, the only supported algorithm is spread, which tries to place them evenly. For instance, if you label each node with a label rack which has a value from 1-10, then specify a placement preference keyed on rack, then service tasks are placed as evenly as possible across all nodes with the label rack, after taking other placement constraints, placement preferences, and other node-specific limitations into account.
trans-unit.target: 放置首选项使您可以将具有一定范围值的任意标签应用于每个节点，并使用算法在这些节点上分布服务任务。当前，唯一受支持的算法是 spread ，它尝试将它们均匀放置。例如，如果您用一个值在1到10之间的标签 rack 来标记每个节点，然后指定一个键入在 rack 上的放置首选项，则将服务任务尽可能均匀地放置在所有带有标签 rack 节点上，然后再取其他标签。放置限制，放置首选项和其他特定于节点的限制。

trans-unit.source: You can rely on the routing mesh. When you publish a service port, the swarm makes the service accessible at the target port on every node, regardless of whether there is a task for the service running on that node or not. This is less complex and is the right choice for many types of services.
trans-unit.target: 您可以依靠路由网格。发布服务端口时，无论是否在该节点上运行服务的任务，群集都会使服务在每个节点上的目标端口上可访问。这不太复杂，是许多类型服务的正确选择。

trans-unit.source: You can publish a service task’s port directly on the swarm node where that service is running. This feature is available in Docker 1.13 and higher. This bypasses the routing mesh and provides the maximum flexibility, including the ability for you to develop your own routing framework. However, you are responsible for keeping track of where each task is running and routing requests to the tasks, and load-balancing across the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以直接在运行该服务的swarm节点上发布服务任务的端口。Docker 1.13及更高版本中提供了此功能。这绕过了路由网格，并提供了最大的灵活性，包括您开发自己的路由框架的能力。但是，您负责跟踪每个任务的运行位置，并将请求路由到这些任务，并负责跨节点进行负载平衡。

trans-unit.source: Getting started with swarm mode (Docker Engine 1.12 and above)
trans-unit.target: 群模式入门（Docker Engine 1.12及更高版本）

trans-unit.source: Authorization plugins offer more fine-grained control to supplement authentication from mutual TLS. In addition to other information described in the above document, authorization plugins running on a Docker daemon receive the certificate information for connecting Docker clients.
trans-unit.target: 授权插件提供了更细粒度的控制，以补充来自相互TLS的身份验证。除了上述文档中描述的其他信息外，在Docker守护程序上运行的授权插件还会接收用于连接Docker客户端的证书信息。

trans-unit.source: Add nodes to the swarm to balance your swarm’s load. Replicated service tasks are distributed across the swarm as evenly as possible over time, as long as the worker nodes are matched to the requirements of the services. When limiting a service to run on only specific types of nodes, such as nodes with a specific number of CPUs or amount of memory, remember that worker nodes that do not meet these requirements cannot run these tasks.
trans-unit.target: 向群集添加节点以平衡群集的负载。只要工作节点符合服务需求，复制的服务任务就会在整个工作组中尽可能均匀地分布。当将服务限制为仅在特定类型的节点（例如具有特定CPU数量或内存量的节点）上运行时，请记住不满足这些要求的辅助节点无法运行这些任务。

trans-unit.source: Legacy plugins do not work in swarm mode. However, plugins written using the v2 plugin system do work in swarm mode, as long as they are installed on each swarm worker node.
trans-unit.target: 旧版插件无法在群体模式下工作。但是，只要将v2插件系统编写的插件安装在每个swarm worker节点上，它们便可以以swarm模式工作。

trans-unit.source: Swarm networking for more information about the default address pool usage
trans-unit.target: 群集网络以获取有关默认地址池使用情况的更多信息

trans-unit.source: Samples: Our samples include multiple examples of popular software running in containers, and some good labs that teach best practices.
trans-unit.target: 样本：我们的样本包括在容器中运行的流行软件的多个示例，以及一些教授最佳实践的优秀实验室。

trans-unit.source: Docker Swarm, a Docker-native clustering system, exposes the same API as a single Docker host, which means you can use Compose against a Swarm instance and run your apps across multiple hosts.
trans-unit.target: Docker Swarm是一个Docker原生集群系统，它公开了与单个Docker主机相同的API，这意味着您可以对Swarm实例使用Compose并在多个主机上运行您的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Provision a Docker Swarm cluster with Docker Machine (Legacy Swarm)
trans-unit.target: 使用Docker Machine（Legacy Swarm）设置Docker Swarm集群

trans-unit.source: Issue 783 is about file permissions problems that can occur when using the AUFS file system. You might notice it during an attempt to rm a file, for example.
trans-unit.target: 问题783是有关使用AUFS文件系统时可能发生的文件权限问题。你可能会试图在注意它 rm 文件，例如。

trans-unit.source: VMware Workstation (unofficial plugin, not supported by Docker)
Docker Hub - our SaaS service for sharing and managing your application stacks.
trans-unit.target: Docker Hub-我们的SaaS服务，用于共享和管理您的应用程序堆栈。

trans-unit.source: Docker Hub contains many pre-built images that you can pull and try without needing to define and configure your own.
trans-unit.target: Docker Hub包含许多预先构建的映像，您可以 pull 并尝试这些映像，而无需定义和配置自己的映像。

trans-unit.source: nginx is an open source reverse proxy, load balancer, HTTP cache, and a web server. If you run nginx as a service using the routing mesh, connecting to the nginx port on any swarm node shows you the web page for (effectively) a random swarm node running the service.
trans-unit.target: nginx是一个开源反向代理，负载平衡器，HTTP缓存和Web服务器。如果您使用路由网格将nginx作为服务运行，则连接到任何群集节点上的nginx端口都会显示（有效地）运行该服务的随机群集节点的网页。

trans-unit.source: Get Docker Enterprise for your server’s OS from Docker Hub.
trans-unit.target: 从Docker Hub获取适用于您服务器操作系统的Docker Enterprise。

trans-unit.source: Training: Official Docker courses that offer in-person instruction and virtual classroom environments.
trans-unit.target: 培训：官方Docker课程，提供现场指导和虚拟教室环境。

trans-unit.source: Docker is a platform for developers and sysadmins to develop, ship, and run applications. Docker lets you quickly assemble applications from components and eliminates the friction that can come when shipping code. Docker lets you get your code tested and deployed into production as fast as possible.
trans-unit.target: Docker是供开发人员和系统管理员开发，交付和运行应用程序的平台。Docker使您可以从组件快速组装应用程序，并消除了交付代码时可能产生的摩擦。Docker使您可以尽快测试代码并将其部署到生产中。

trans-unit.source: Linode (unofficial plugin, not supported by Docker)
"127.0.0.1:4443" means listen on port 4443 on localhost only. That means that the server is not accessible except locally (via SSH tunnel, or just on a local terminal)
trans-unit.target: "127.0.0.1:4443" 表示仅在本地主机上的端口4443上侦听。这意味着该服务器只能在本地访问（通过SSH隧道或仅在本地终端上）

trans-unit.source: "127.0.0.1:4444" means listen on port 4444 on localhost only. That means that the server is not accessible except locally (via SSH tunnel, or just on a local terminal)
trans-unit.target: "127.0.0.1:4444" 表示仅在本地主机上的端口4444上侦听。这意味着该服务器只能在本地访问（通过SSH隧道或仅在本地终端上）

trans-unit.source: "127.0.0.1:7899" means listen on port 7899 on localhost only. That means that the server is not accessible except locally (via SSH tunnel, or just on a local terminal)
trans-unit.target: "127.0.0.1:7899" 表示仅在本地主机上的端口7899上侦听。这意味着该服务器只能在本地访问（通过SSH隧道或仅在本地终端上）

trans-unit.source: ":4443" means listen on port 4443 on all IPs (and hence all interfaces, such as those listed when you run ifconfig)
trans-unit.target: ":4443" 表示侦听所有IP上的端口4443（因此侦听所有接口，例如运行 ifconfig 时列出的接口）

trans-unit.source: ":4444" means listen on port 4444 on all IPs (and hence all interfaces, such as those listed when you run ifconfig)
trans-unit.target: ":4444" 表示侦听所有IP上的端口4444（因此侦听所有接口，例如运行 ifconfig 时列出的接口）

trans-unit.source: ":7899" means listen on port 7899 on all IPs (and hence all interfaces, such as those listed when you run ifconfig)
trans-unit.target: ":7899" 表示侦听所有IP上的端口7899（因此侦听所有接口，例如运行 ifconfig 时列出的接口）

trans-unit.source: $ docker build where the FROM image is not signed or is not scratch.
trans-unit.target: $ docker build 其中 FROM 映像未签名或未擦除。

trans-unit.source: $ docker container run of an unsigned or altered image.
trans-unit.target: $ docker container run 的未签名或更改的图像。

trans-unit.source: $ docker pull of an unsigned or altered image.
trans-unit.target: $ docker pull 未签名或更改的图像。

trans-unit.source: ${VARIABLE-default} evaluates to default only if VARIABLE is unset in the environment.
trans-unit.target: ${VARIABLE-default} 计算为 default 只有当 VARIABLE 是在环境未设置。

trans-unit.source: ${VARIABLE:-default} evaluates to default if VARIABLE is unset or empty in the environment.
trans-unit.target: ${VARIABLE:-default} 如果在环境中未设置 VARIABLE 或为空，则$ {VARIABLE：-default}的值为 default 。

trans-unit.source: ${VARIABLE:?err} exits with an error message containing err if VARIABLE is unset or empty in the environment.
trans-unit.target: ${VARIABLE:?err} 如果在环境中未设置 VARIABLE 或该变量为空，则$ {VARIABLE：？err}退出并显示一条错误消息，提示 err 。

trans-unit.source: ${VARIABLE?err} exits with an error message containing err if VARIABLE is unset in the environment.
trans-unit.target: ${VARIABLE?err} 如果在环境中未设置 VARIABLE ,则$ {VARIABLE？err}会退出，并显示一条错误消息，提示 err 。

trans-unit.source: ${variable:+word} indicates that if variable is set then word will be the result, otherwise the result is the empty string.
trans-unit.target: ${variable:+word} 表示如果设置了 variable ，则 word 将为结果，否则结果为空字符串。

trans-unit.source: ${variable:-word} indicates that if variable is set then the result will be that value. If variable is not set then word will be the result.
trans-unit.target: ${variable:-word} 表示如果设置了 variable ，那么结果将是该值。如果未设置 variable 则将是 word 。

trans-unit.source: <machine> - name of the host you want to create
--alias option can be used to resolve the container by another name in the network being connected to.
trans-unit.target: --alias 选项可用于通过所连接网络中的另一个名称来解析容器。

trans-unit.source: --allow-nondistributable-artifacts 10.1.0.0/16 tells the Docker daemon to push nondistributable artifacts to all registries whose resolved IP address is within the subnet described by the CIDR syntax.
trans-unit.target: --allow-nondistributable-artifacts 10.1.0.0/16 告诉Docker守护进程将不可分发的工件推送到所有解析的IP地址在CIDR语法描述的子网内的注册表中。

trans-unit.source: --allow-nondistributable-artifacts myregistry:5000 tells the Docker daemon to push nondistributable artifacts to myregistry:5000.
trans-unit.target: --allow-nondistributable-artifacts myregistry:5000 告诉Docker守护进程将不可分发的工件推送到myregistry：5000。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-access-key: Your access key ID for the Amazon Web Services API.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-access-key ：您的Amazon Web Services API的访问密钥ID。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-ami: The AMI ID of the instance to use.
--amazonec2-block-duration-minutes: AWS spot instance duration in minutes (60, 120, 180, 240, 300, or 360).
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-block-duration-minutes ：AWS 竞价型实例持续时间以分钟为单位（60、120、180、240、300或360）。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-device-name: The root device name of the instance.
--amazonec2-endpoint: Optional endpoint URL (hostname only or a fully qualified URI).
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-endpoint ：可选的端点URL（仅主机名或标准URI）。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-iam-instance-profile: The AWS IAM role name to be used as the instance profile.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-iam-instance-profile ：用作实例配置文件的AWS IAM角色名称。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-open-port: Make the specified port number accessible from the Internet.
--amazonec2-private-address-only: Use the private IP address only.
--amazonec2-region: The region to use when launching the instance.
--amazonec2-retries: Set retry count for recoverable failures (use -1 to disable).
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-retries ：设置可恢复失败的重试计数（使用 -1 禁用）。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-root-size: The root disk size of the instance (in GB).
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-root-size ：实例的根磁盘大小（以GB为单位）。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-secret-key: Your secret access key for the Amazon Web Services API.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-secret-key ：您对Amazon Web Services API的秘密访问密钥。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-security-group-readonly: Skip adding default rules to security groups.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-security-group-readonly ：跳过向安全组添加默认规则的操作。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-session-token: Your session token for the Amazon Web Services API.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-session-token ：您的Amazon Web Services API的会话令牌。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-spot-price: Spot instance bid price in dollars. Requires the --amazonec2-request-spot-instance flag.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-spot-price ：现货实例出价（以美元为单位）。需要 --amazonec2-request-spot-instance 标志。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-ssh-keypath: Path to private key file to use for instance. Requires a matching public key with .pub extension to exist.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-ssh-keypath ：例如要使用的私钥文件的路径。要求匹配的公共密钥具有 .pub 扩展名。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-ssh-user: The SSH login username, which must match the default SSH user set in the AMI being used.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-ssh-user ：SSH登录用户名，必须与正在使用的AMI中设置的默认SSH用户匹配。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-tags: A comma-separated list of AWS extra tag key-value pairs. For example, key1,value1,key2,value2.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-tags ：AWS额外标签键值对的逗号分隔列表。例如， key1,value1,key2,value2 。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-use-ebs-optimized-instance: Create an EBS Optimized Instance. Instance type must support it.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-use-ebs-optimized-instance ：创建一个EBS优化实例。实例类型必须支持它。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-use-private-address: Use the private IP address for docker-machine, but still create a public IP address.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-use-private-address ：将私有IP地址用于docker-machine，但仍创建一个公共IP地址。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-userdata: Path to file with cloud-init user data.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-userdata ：具有云初始化用户数据的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-volume-type: The Amazon EBS volume type to be attached to the instance.
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-volume-type ：要附加到实例的Amazon EBS卷类型。

trans-unit.source: --amazonec2-vpc-id: Your VPC ID to launch the instance in.
--amazonec2-zone: The AWS zone to launch the instance in (one of a,b,c,d, and e).
trans-unit.target: --amazonec2-zone ：要在（a，b，c，d和e中的一个）启动实例的AWS区域。

trans-unit.source: --azure-availability-set: Azure Availability Set to place the virtual machine into. [?]
trans-unit.target: --azure-availability-set ：用于将虚拟机放入其中的Azure可用性集。[ ？]

trans-unit.source: --azure-image: Azure virtual machine image in the format of Publisher:Offer:Sku:Version [?]
--azure-location: Azure region to create the virtual machine. [?]
--azure-no-public-ip: Do not create a public IP address for the machine (implies --azure-use-private-ip). Should be used only when creating machines from an Azure VM within the same subnet.
trans-unit.target: --azure-no-public-ip ：不要为计算机创建公共IP地址（意味着 --azure-use-private-ip ）。仅当从同一子网内的Azure VM创建计算机时才应使用。

trans-unit.source: --azure-open-port: Make additional port number(s) accessible from the Internet [?]
--azure-private-ip-address: Specify a static private IP address for the machine.
trans-unit.target: --azure-private-ip-address ：为计算机指定一个静态专用IP地址。

trans-unit.source: --azure-resource-group: Azure Resource Group name to create the resources in.
trans-unit.target: --azure-resource-group ：用于在其中创建资源的Azure资源组名称。

trans-unit.source: --azure-static-public-ip: Assign a static public IP address to the machine.
trans-unit.target: --azure-static-public-ip ：为计算机分配静态公共IP地址。

trans-unit.source: --azure-subnet-prefix: Private CIDR block. Used to create subnet if it does not exist. Must match in the case that the subnet does exist.
trans-unit.target: --azure-subnet-prefix ：专用CIDR块。用于创建子网（如果不存在）。如果子网确实存在，则必须匹配。

trans-unit.source: --azure-subnet: Azure Subnet Name to be used within the Virtual Network.
trans-unit.target: --azure-subnet ：虚拟网络中要使用的Azure子网名称。

trans-unit.source: --azure-use-private-ip: Use private IP address of the machine to connect. Useful for managing Docker machines from another machine on the same network, such as when deploying Swarm.
trans-unit.target: --azure-use-private-ip ：使用机器的私有IP地址进行连接。对于管理来自同一网络中另一台机器的Docker机器非常有用，例如在部署Swarm时。

trans-unit.source: --azure-vnet: Azure Virtual Network name to connect the virtual machine. [?] To specify a Virtual Network from another resource group, use resourcegroup:vnet-name format.
trans-unit.target: --azure-vnet ：用于连接虚拟机的Azure虚拟网络名称。[ ？]要从另一个资源组指定虚拟网络，请使用 resourcegroup:vnet-name 格式。

trans-unit.source: --config-file=/etc/docker/daemon.json is the path where configuration file is stored. You can use it instead of daemon flags. Specify the path for each daemon.
trans-unit.target: --config-file=/etc/docker/daemon.json 是存储配置文件的路径。您可以使用它代替守护程序标志。指定每个守护程序的路径。

trans-unit.source: --data-root is the path where persisted data such as images, volumes, and cluster state are stored. The default value is /var/lib/docker. To avoid any conflict with other daemons, set this parameter separately for each daemon.
trans-unit.target: --data-root 是存储持久性数据（例如图像，卷和群集状态）的路径。默认值为 /var/lib/docker 。为避免与其他守护程序发生任何冲突，请为每个守护程序分别设置此参数。

trans-unit.source: --default-ulimit allows you to set the default ulimit options to use for all containers. It takes the same options as --ulimit for docker run. If these defaults are not set, ulimit settings will be inherited, if not set on docker run, from the Docker daemon. Any --ulimit options passed to docker run will overwrite these defaults.
trans-unit.target: --default-ulimit 允许您设置要用于所有容器的默认 ulimit 选项。它采用相同的选项， --ulimit 的 docker run 。如果未设置这些默认值，则 ulimit 设置将从Docker守护程序继承（如果未在 docker run 上设置）。传递给 --ulimit docker run 任何--ulimit选项都将覆盖这些默认值。

trans-unit.source: --digitalocean-access-token: required. Your personal access token for the DigitalOcean API.
trans-unit.target: --digitalocean-access-token ：必填。您的DigitalOcean API个人访问令牌。

trans-unit.source: --digitalocean-backups: Enable DigitalOcean backups for the droplet.
--digitalocean-image: The name of the DigitalOcean image to use.
--digitalocean-ipv6: Enable IPv6 support for the droplet.
--digitalocean-private-networking: Enable private networking support for the droplet.
--digitalocean-region: The region to create the droplet in, see Regions API for how to get a list.
trans-unit.target: --digitalocean-region ：要在其中创建小滴的区域，有关如何获取列表的信息，请参见Regions API。

trans-unit.source: --digitalocean-size: The size of the DigitalOcean droplet (larger than default options are of the form 2gb).
trans-unit.target: --digitalocean-size ：Dig​​italOcean小滴的大小（大于默认选项的形式为 2gb ）。

trans-unit.source: --digitalocean-ssh-key-fingerprint: Use an existing SSH key instead of creating a new one, see SSH keys.
trans-unit.target: --digitalocean-ssh-key-fingerprint ：使用现有的SSH密钥代替创建新的SSH密钥，请参阅SSH密钥。

trans-unit.source: --digitalocean-tags: Comma-separated list of tags to apply to the Droplet, see Droplet tagging
trans-unit.target: --digitalocean-tags ：以逗号分隔的标签列表，适用于Droplet，请参见Droplet标签

trans-unit.source: --digitalocean-userdata: Path to file containing User Data for the droplet.
trans-unit.target: --digitalocean-userdata ：包含液滴的用户数据的文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: --driver - to indicate the provider on which to create the machine (VirtualBox, DigitalOcean, AWS, and so on)
trans-unit.target: --driver -指示要在其上创建计算机的提供程序（VirtualBox，DigitalOcean，AWS等）

trans-unit.source: --engine-insecure-registry: Specify insecure registries to allow with the created engine
trans-unit.target: --engine-insecure-registry ：指定不安全的注册表以允许创建的引擎

trans-unit.source: --engine-storage-driver: Specify a storage driver to use with the engine
trans-unit.target: --engine-storage-driver ：指定要与引擎一起使用的存储驱动程序

trans-unit.source: --exec-root is the path where the container state is stored. The default value is /var/run/docker. Specify the path for your running daemon here.
trans-unit.target: --exec-root 是存储容器状态的路径。默认值为 /var/run/docker 。在此处指定正在运行的守护程序的路径。

trans-unit.source: --exoscale-affinity-group: Anti-affinity group the machine is started in.
--exoscale-disk-size: Disk size for the host in GiB (at least 10);
--exoscale-image: Image template, for example ubuntu-16.04, also known as Linux Ubuntu 16.04 LTS 64-bit, see below);
trans-unit.target: --exoscale-image ：图像模板，例如 ubuntu-16.04 ，也称为 Linux Ubuntu 16.04 LTS 64-bit ，请参见下文）;
--exoscale-instance-profile ：实例配置文件（小型，中型，大型等）；

trans-unit.source: --exoscale-security-group: Security group. It is created if it doesn’t exist;
trans-unit.target: --exoscale-security-group ：安全组。如果不存在则创建它。

trans-unit.source: --exoscale-ssh-key: Path to the SSH user private key. A new one is created if left empty;
trans-unit.target: --exoscale-ssh-key ：SSH用户私钥的路径。如果留空则创建一个新的；

trans-unit.source: --exoscale-ssh-user: SSH username to connect, such as ubuntu, see below);
trans-unit.target: --exoscale-ssh-user ：要连接的SSH用户名，例如 ubuntu ，请参见下文）；

trans-unit.source: --exoscale-userdata: Path to file containing user data for cloud-init;
trans-unit.target: --exoscale-userdata ：包含cloud-init用户数据的文件的路径；

trans-unit.source: --google-address: Instance’s static external IP (name or IP).
--google-machine-image: The absolute URL to a base VM image to instantiate.
trans-unit.target: --google-machine-image ：要实例化的基本VM映像的绝对URL。

trans-unit.source: --google-network: Specify network in which to provision VM.
--google-project: required The ID of your project to use when launching the instance.
trans-unit.target: --google-project ：必需启动实例时要使用的项目的ID。

trans-unit.source: --google-scopes: The scopes for OAuth 2.0 to Access Google APIs. See Google Compute Engine Doc.
trans-unit.target: --google-scopes ：OAuth 2.0访问Google API的范围。请参阅Google Compute Engine文件。

trans-unit.source: --google-subnetwork: Specify subnetwork in which to provision VM.

--google-use-existing: Don’t create a new VM, use an existing one. This is useful when you’d like to provision Docker on a VM you created yourself, maybe because it uses create options not supported by this driver.
trans-unit.target: --google-use-existing ：不要创建新的VM，请使用现有的VM。当您想在自己创建的VM上配置Docker时，这很有用，也许是因为它使用了该驱动程序不支持的创建选项。

trans-unit.source: --google-use-internal-ip-only: When this option is used during create, the new VM is not assigned a public IP address. This is useful only when the host running docker-machine is located inside the Google Cloud infrastructure; otherwise, docker-machine can’t reach the VM to provision the Docker daemon. The presence of this flag implies --google-use-internal-ip.
trans-unit.target: --google-use-internal-ip-only ：在创建过程中使用此选项时，不会为新VM分配公共IP地址。仅当运行 docker-machine 的主机位于Google Cloud基础架构内部时，此选项才有用。否则， docker-machine 无法访问VM来预配 Docker守护程序。此标志的存在表示 --google-use-internal-ip 。

trans-unit.source: --google-use-internal-ip: When this option is used during create, docker-machine uses internal rather than public NATed IPs. The flag is persistent in the sense that a machine created with it retains the IP. It’s useful for managing docker machines from another machine on the same network, such as when deploying swarm.
trans-unit.target: --google-use-internal-ip ：在创建过程中使用此选项时，docker-machine使用内部而不是公共NATed IP。从使用它创建的机器保留IP的意义上讲，该标志是持久的。这对于管理来自同一网络中另一台计算机的docker计算机非常有用，例如在部署swarm时。

trans-unit.source: --google-username: The username to use for the instance.
--google-zone: The zone to launch the instance.
--host=[] specifies where the Docker daemon will listen for client connections. If unspecified, it defaults to /var/run/docker.sock.
trans-unit.target: --host=[] 指定Docker守护程序将在何处侦听客户端连接。如果未指定，则默认为 /var/run/docker.sock 。

trans-unit.source: --hyperv-boot2docker-url: The URL of the boot2docker ISO.
--hyperv-cpu-count: Number of CPUs for the host.
--hyperv-disk-size: Size of disk for the host in MB.
--hyperv-memory: Size of memory for the host in MB.
--hyperv-static-macaddress: Hyper-V network adapter’s static MAC address.
--hyperv-virtual-switch: Name of the virtual switch to use.
trans-unit.target: --hyperv-virtual-switch ：要使用的虚拟交换机的名称。

trans-unit.source: --hyperv-vlan-id: Hyper-V network adapter’s VLAN ID if any.
--insecure-registry 10.1.0.0/16 tells the Docker daemon that all registries whose domain resolve to an IP address is part of the subnet described by the CIDR syntax, should be considered insecure.
trans-unit.target: --insecure-registry 10.1.0.0/16 告诉Docker守护程序，其域解析为IP地址的所有注册表都是CIDR语法描述的子网的一部分，应被视为不安全。

trans-unit.source: --insecure-registry myregistry:5000 tells the Docker daemon that myregistry:5000 should be considered insecure.
trans-unit.target: --insecure-registry myregistry:5000 告诉Docker守护程序myregistry：5000应该被认为是不安全的。

trans-unit.source: --iptables=false prevents the Docker daemon from adding iptables rules. If multiple daemons manage iptables rules, they may overwrite rules set by another daemon. Be aware that disabling this option requires you to manually add iptables rules to expose container ports. If you prevent Docker from adding iptables rules, Docker will also not add IP masquerading rules, even if you set --ip-masq to true. Without IP masquerading rules, Docker containers will not be able to connect to external hosts or the internet when using network other than default bridge.
trans-unit.target: --iptables=false 阻止Docker守护程序添加iptables规则。如果多个守护程序管理iptables规则，则它们可能会覆盖另一个守护程序设置的规则。请注意，禁用此选项需要您手动添加iptables规则以公开容器端口。如果您阻止Docker添加iptables规则，即使将 --ip-masq 设置为 true ，Docker也不会添加IP伪装规则。如果没有IP伪装规则，则使用默认网桥以外的网络时，Docker容器将无法连接到外部主机或互联网。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-active-timeout: The timeout in seconds until the OpenStack instance must be active.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-active-timeout ：直到必须激活OpenStack实例的超时时间（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-availability-zone: The availability zone in which to launch the server.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-availability-zone ：在其中启动服务器的可用性区域。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-config-drive: Whether OpenStack should mount a configuration drive for the machine.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-config-drive ：OpenStack是否应为计算机安装配置驱动器。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-domain-name or --openstack-domain-id: Domain to use for authentication (Keystone v3 only).
trans-unit.target: --openstack-domain-name 或 --openstack-domain-id ：用于身份验证的域（仅Keystone v3）。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-endpoint-type: Endpoint type can be internalURL, adminURL, or publicURL. It is a helper for the driver to choose the right URL in the OpenStack service catalog. If not provided the default is publicURL.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-endpoint-type ：端点类型可以是 internalURL ， adminURL 或 publicURL 。驱动程序可以在OpenStack服务目录中选择正确的URL，这是一个帮助。如果未提供，则默认值为 publicURL 。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-flavor-id or --openstack-flavor-name: Identify the flavor used for the machine.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-flavor-id 或 --openstack-flavor-name ：确定机器使用的风味。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-floatingip-pool: The IP pool used to get a public IP can assign it to the machine. If there is an IP address already allocated but not assigned to any machine, this IP is chosen and assigned to the machine. If there is no IP address already allocated, a new IP is allocated and assigned to the machine.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-floatingip-pool ：用于获取公共IP的IP池可以将其分配给计算机。如果已经分配但未分配给任何计算机的IP地址，则选择该IP并将其分配给计算机。如果尚未分配IP地址，则会分配新IP并将其分配给计算机。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-image-id or --openstack-image-name: Identify the image used for the machine.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-image-id 或 --openstack-image-name ：标识用于计算机的映像。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-insecure: Explicitly allow openstack driver to perform “insecure” SSL (https) requests. The server’s certificate is not verified against any certificate authorities. This option should be used with caution.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-insecure ：明确允许openstack驱动程序执行“不安全”的SSL（https）请求。没有针对任何证书颁发机构验证服务器的证书。该选项应谨慎使用。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-ip-version: If the instance has both IPv4 and IPv6 address, you can select IP version. If not provided, defaults to 4.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-ip-version ：如果实例同时具有IPv4和IPv6地址，则可以选择IP版本。如果未提供，则默认为 4 。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-keypair-name: Specify the existing Nova keypair to use.
--openstack-net-name or --openstack-net-id: Identify the private network the machine is connected to. If your OpenStack project contains only one private network it is used automatically.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-net-name 或 --openstack-net-id ：标识计算机连接到的专用网络。如果您的OpenStack项目仅包含一个专用网络，则会自动使用它。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-password: User password. It can be omitted if the standard environment variable OS_PASSWORD is set.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-password ：用户密码。如果设置了标准环境变量 OS_PASSWORD ，则可以省略。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-private-key-file: Used with --openstack-keypair-name, associates the private key to the keypair.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-private-key-file ：与 --openstack-keypair-name 一起使用，将私钥与密钥对关联。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-region: The region to work on. Can be omitted if there is only one region on the OpenStack.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-region ：要处理的区域。如果OpenStack上只有一个区域，则可以省略。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-sec-groups: If security groups are available on your OpenStack you can specify a comma separated list to use for the machine, such as secgrp001,secgrp002.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-sec-groups ：如果您的OpenStack上有安全组，则可以指定用逗号分隔的列表，例如 secgrp001,secgrp002 。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-ssh-user: The username to use for SSH into the machine. If not provided defaults to root.
trans-unit.target: --openstack-ssh-user ：用于SSH进入计算机的用户名。如果未提供，则默认为 root 。

trans-unit.source: --openstack-tenant-name or --openstack-tenant-id: Identify the tenant in which the machine is created.

trans-unit.target: -logf=<format> -此标志设置日志的输出格​​式。可能的格式为“ json”和“ logfmt”。

trans-unit.target: -p, --pidfile=/var/run/docker.pid 是守护程序的进程ID的存储路径。在此处指定您的pid文件的路径。

trans-unit.source: /etc/nginx/conf.d/site.conf (or /run/secrets/site.conf if you used the second example)
ADD [--chown=<user>:<group>] ["<src>",... "<dest>"] (this form is required for paths containing whitespace)
trans-unit.target: ADD [--chown=<user>:<group>] ["<src>",... "<dest>"] （此格式对于包含空格的路径是必需的）

trans-unit.source: ARG is the only instruction that may precede FROM in the Dockerfile. See Understand how ARG and FROM interact.
trans-unit.target: ARG 是可先只指令 FROM 在 Dockerfile 。请参阅了解ARG和FROM之间的相互作用。

trans-unit.source: ARG variables are not persisted into the built image as ENV variables are. However, ARG variables do impact the build cache in similar ways. If a Dockerfile defines an ARG variable whose value is different from a previous build, then a “cache miss” occurs upon its first usage, not its definition. In particular, all RUN instructions following an ARG instruction use the ARG variable implicitly (as an environment variable), thus can cause a cache miss. All predefined ARG variables are exempt from caching unless there is a matching ARG statement in the Dockerfile.
trans-unit.target: ARG 变量不会像 ENV 变量那样持久保存到生成的映像中。但是， ARG 变量确实以类似方式影响构建缓存。如果Dockerfile定义了一个值与先前版本不同的 ARG 变量，则首次使用时会发生“缓存未命中”，而不是其定义。特别是，所有在 ARG 指令之后的 RUN 指令都隐式使用 ARG 变量（作为环境变量），因此可能导致高速缓存未命中。除非 Dockerfile 中有匹配的 ARG 语句，否则所有预定义的 ARG 变量均免于缓存。

trans-unit.source: Active means that the scheduler can assign tasks to the node.
trans-unit.target: Active 意味着调度程序可以将任务分配给节点。
AdministrativeKeys 将列出 Repository 和 Root 密钥。

trans-unit.source: BUILDPLATFORM - platform of the node performing the build.
CMD ["executable","param1","param2"] (exec form, this is the preferred form)
CMD should be used as a way of defining default arguments for an ENTRYPOINT command or for executing an ad-hoc command in a container.
trans-unit.target: CMD 应该用作定义 ENTRYPOINT 命令或在容器中执行即席命令的默认参数的方式。

trans-unit.source: CMD will be overridden when running the container with alternative arguments.
trans-unit.target: CMD 使用替代参数运行容器时，CMD将被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: COPY [--chown=<user>:<group>] ["<src>",... "<dest>"] (this form is required for paths containing whitespace)
trans-unit.target: COPY [--chown=<user>:<group>] ["<src>",... "<dest>"] （此格式对于包含空格的路径是必需的）

trans-unit.source: DEST_PATH does not exist and ends with /
DEST_PATH is created as a directory and the contents of the source directory are copied into this directory
trans-unit.target: DEST_PATH 创建为目录，并将源目录的内容复制到该目录中

DOCKER_CLI_EXPERIMENTAL Enable experimental features for the cli (e.g. enabled or disabled)
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_CLI_EXPERIMENTAL 启用cli的实验功能（例如， enabled 或 disabled ）

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_CONFIG The location of your client configuration files.
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_CONFIG 客户端配置文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_CONTENT_TRUST When set Docker uses notary to sign and verify images. Equates to --disable-content-trust=false for build, create, pull, push, run.
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_CONTENT_TRUST 设置后，Docker将使用公证人签署和验证映像。等同于 --disable-content-trust=false 进行构建，创建，拉取，推送，运行。

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_CONTENT_TRUST_SERVER The URL of the Notary server to use. This defaults to the same URL as the registry.
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_CONTENT_TRUST_SERVER 要使用的公证服务器的URL。默认情况下，该URL与注册表相同。

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_CONTEXT Specify the context to use (overrides DOCKER_HOST env var and default context set with “docker context use”)
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_CONTEXT 指定要使用的上下文（用“ docker context use”覆盖DOCKER_HOST env var和默认上下文集）

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM Specify the default platform for the commands that take the --platform flag.
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_DEFAULT_PLATFORM 为 --platform 标志的命令指定默认平台。
DOCKER_DRIVER 要使用的图形驱动程序。

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_HIDE_LEGACY_COMMANDS When set, Docker hides “legacy” top-level commands (such as docker rm, and docker pull) in docker help output, and only Management commands per object-type (e.g., docker container) are printed. This may become the default in a future release, at which point this environment-variable is removed.
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_HIDE_LEGACY_COMMANDS 设置后，Docker在docker docker help 输出中隐藏“旧式”顶级命令（例如 docker rm 和 docker pull ），并且仅打印每种对象类型的 Management commands （例如 docker container ）。这可能会成为将来版本中的默认值，届时将删除此环境变量。
DOCKER_HOST 要连接的守护程序套接字。

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_NOWARN_KERNEL_VERSION Prevent warnings that your Linux kernel is unsuitable for Docker.
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_NOWARN_KERNEL_VERSION 防止警告您的Linux内核不适合Docker。

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_STACK_ORCHESTRATOR Configure the default orchestrator to use when using docker stack management commands.
trans-unit.target: DOCKER_STACK_ORCHESTRATOR 配置使用docker docker stack 管理命令时要使用的默认协调器。

trans-unit.source: DOCKER_TLS_VERIFY When set Docker uses TLS and verifies the remote.

trans-unit.source: Disabled - Verification is not active and the remainder of the content-trust related metadata will be ignored. This is the default value if mode is not specified.
trans-unit.target: Disabled -验证未处于活动状态，其余与内容信任相关的元数据将被忽略。如果未指定 mode ,则为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Dockerfile defines what goes on in the environment inside your container. Access to resources like networking interfaces and disk drives is virtualized inside this environment, which is isolated from the rest of your system, so you need to map ports to the outside world, and be specific about what files you want to “copy in” to that environment. However, after doing that, you can expect that the build of your app defined in this Dockerfile behaves exactly the same wherever it runs.
trans-unit.target: Dockerfile 定义了容器内部环境中发生的事情。在这种环境内虚拟化了对网络接口和磁盘驱动器等资源的访问，该环境与系统的其余部分隔离，因此您需要将端口映射到外部环境，并具体说明要“复制”到的文件那个环境。但是，这样做之后，您可以期望在此 Dockerfile 中定义的应用程序构建无论在任何地方运行都具有完全相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: Drain means the scheduler doesn’t assign new tasks to the node. The scheduler shuts down any existing tasks and schedules them on an available node.
trans-unit.target: Drain 意味着调度程序不会将新任务分配给该节点。调度程序将关闭所有现有任务，并将它们调度在可用节点上。

trans-unit.source: ENTRYPOINT should be defined when using the container as an executable.
trans-unit.target: ENTRYPOINT 使用容器作为可执行文件时，应定义ENTRYPOINT。

trans-unit.source: Enforced - Content trust will be enforced and an image that cannot be verified successfully will not be pulled or run.
trans-unit.target: Enforced -内容信任将被强制执行，无法成功验证的图像将不会被拉出或运行。

trans-unit.source: Err is either empty or contains an error string.
trans-unit.target: Err 为空或包含错误字符串。

trans-unit.source: FROM can appear multiple times within a single Dockerfile to create multiple images or use one build stage as a dependency for another. Simply make a note of the last image ID output by the commit before each new FROM instruction. Each FROM instruction clears any state created by previous instructions.
trans-unit.target: FROM 可以在单个 Dockerfile 中多次出现，以创建多个映像或将一个构建阶段用作对另一个构建阶段的依赖。只需在每个新的 FROM 指令之前记录一次提交输出的最后一个图像ID 。每个 FROM 指令清除由先前指令创建的任何状态。

trans-unit.source: FROM instructions support variables that are declared by any ARG instructions that occur before the first FROM.
trans-unit.target: FROM 指令支持第一个 FROM 之前的任何 ARG 指令所声明的变量。

trans-unit.source: HEALTHCHECK NONE (disable any healthcheck inherited from the base image)
trans-unit.target: HEALTHCHECK NONE （禁用从基本映像继承的任何健康检查）

trans-unit.source: HEALTHCHECK [OPTIONS] CMD command (check container health by running a command inside the container)
trans-unit.target: HEALTHCHECK [OPTIONS] CMD command （通过在容器内运行命令来检查容器的运行状况）

trans-unit.source: ID is a unique ID for the caller that is requesting the mount.
trans-unit.target: ID 是请求挂载的调用方的唯一ID。

trans-unit.source: Leader means the node is the primary manager node that makes all swarm management and orchestration decisions for the swarm.

trans-unit.source: MAINTAINER was an early very limited form of LABEL which should be used instead.
trans-unit.target: MAINTAINER 是 LABEL 的早期非常有限的形式，应改为使用。

trans-unit.source: Mountpoint is optional. However, the plugin may be queried again later if one is not provided.
trans-unit.target: Mountpoint 是可选的。但是，如果未提供该插件，则稍后可能会再次查询该插件。

trans-unit.source: Mountpoint is the path on the host (v1) or in the plugin (v2) where the volume has been made available.
trans-unit.target: Mountpoint 是使卷可用的主机（v1）或插件（v2）中的路径。

trans-unit.source: ONBUILD (when combined with one of the supported instructions above)

trans-unit.source: Permissive - Verification will be performed, but only failures will be logged and remain unenforced. This configuration is intended for testing of changes related to content-trust. The results of the signature verification is displayed in the Docker Engine’s daemon logs.
trans-unit.target: Permissive -将会执行验证，但只会记录失败，并且不会强制执行。此配置旨在测试与内容信任有关的更改。签名验证的结果显示在Docker Engine的守护程序日志中。

trans-unit.target: RUN <command> （shell形式，命令在shell中运行，在Linux上默认为 /bin/sh -c ，在Windows 上默认为 cmd /S /C ）

trans-unit.target: SHARED SIZE （共享大小）是图像与另一图像共享的空间量（即它们的公共数据）

trans-unit.source: SRC_PATH does end with /. (that is: slash followed by dot)
trans-unit.target: SRC_PATH 确实以 /. 结尾。（即：斜杠后跟点）

trans-unit.target: SRC_PATH 不以 /. 结尾。（即：斜杠后跟点）

trans-unit.target: consistency ：安装的一致性要求， consistent （主机和容器具有相同的视图），已 cached （读取缓存，主机视图为权威）或 delegated （读写缓存，容器的视图为权威）之一

trans-unit.source: consistent: Full consistency. The container runtime and the host maintain an identical view of the mount at all times. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: consistent ：完全一致。容器运行时和主机始终保持相同的安装视图。这是默认值。

trans-unit.target: cpu_shares ， cpu_quota ， cpuset ， mem_limit ， memswap_limit ：这些已被 deploy 的资源密钥替换。 deploy 配置仅在使用 docker stack deploy 时生效，而被 docker-compose 忽略。

trans-unit.source: cron, when necessary, should run as a user process, dedicated and tailored for the app that needs its scheduling service, rather than as a platform-wide facility;

trans-unit.target: default-runtime ：如果在容器创建时未指定运行时，它将更新要使用的运行时。它默认为“默认”，这是官方docker软件包附带的运行时。

trans-unit.source: default: Use the default isolation mode configured for the Docker host, as configured by the -exec-opt flag or exec-opts array in daemon.json. If the daemon does not specify an isolation technology, process is the default for Windows Server, and hyperv is the default (and only) choice for Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: default ：使用为Docker主机配置的默认隔离模式，该模式由 daemon.json 中的 -exec-opt 标志或 exec-opts 数组配置。如果守护程序未指定隔离技术，则Windows Server的默认 process 是process，而Windows 10的 hyperv 是默认的（也是唯一的）选择。

trans-unit.source: delay: The time to wait between each container group’s rollback (default 0s).

trans-unit.source: delay: The time to wait between updating a group of containers.

trans-unit.source: endpoint_mode: dnsrr - DNS round-robin (DNSRR) service discovery does not use a single virtual IP. Docker sets up DNS entries for the service such that a DNS query for the service name returns a list of IP addresses, and the client connects directly to one of these. DNS round-robin is useful in cases where you want to use your own load balancer, or for Hybrid Windows and Linux applications.
trans-unit.target: endpoint_mode: dnsrr -DNS循环（DNSRR）服务发现不使用单个虚拟IP。Docker设置服务的DNS条目，以便对服务名称的DNS查询返回IP地址列表，并且客户端直接连接到其中之一。在想要使用自己的负载平衡器或混合Windows和Linux应用程序的情况下，DNS轮询很有用。

trans-unit.source: endpoint_mode: vip - Docker assigns the service a virtual IP (VIP) that acts as the front end for clients to reach the service on a network. Docker routes requests between the client and available worker nodes for the service, without client knowledge of how many nodes are participating in the service or their IP addresses or ports. (This is the default.)
trans-unit.target: endpoint_mode: vip -Docker为该服务分配一个虚拟IP（VIP），该虚拟IP充当客户端访问网络上服务的前端。Docker在客户端和服务的可用工作程序节点之间路由请求，而无需客户端知道有多少节点正在参与服务或其IP地址或端口。（这是默认设置。）

trans-unit.source: engine.labels apply to Docker Engine labels like operating system, drivers, etc. Swarm administrators add node.labels for operational purposes by using the docker node update command.
trans-unit.target: engine.labels 适用于操作系统，驱动程序等Docker Engine标签 node.labels 管理员通过使用docker docker node update 命令为操作目的添加node.labels。

trans-unit.source: extends: This option has been removed for version: "3.x" Compose files. (For more information, see Extending services.)

trans-unit.source: external: If set to true, specifies that this config has already been created. Docker does not attempt to create it, and if it does not exist, a config not found error occurs.

trans-unit.source: external_links: Compose uses Docker networks when running version 2 projects, so links behave slightly differently. In particular, two containers must be connected to at least one network in common in order to communicate, even if explicitly linked together.
trans-unit.target: external_links ：在运行版本2项目时，Compose使用Docker网络，因此链接的行为略有不同。特别是，即使进行显式链接，两个容器也必须共同连接到至少一个网络以进行通信。

trans-unit.target: failure_action ：如果回滚失败，该怎么办。其中的 continue 或 pause （默认 pause ）

trans-unit.source: failure_action: What to do if an update fails. One of continue, rollback, or pause (default: pause).
trans-unit.target: failure_action ：如果更新失败，该怎么办。其中的 continue ， rollback ，或 pause （默认： pause ）。

trans-unit.source: features: it explicitly enables or disables specific features.
trans-unit.target: features ：它显式启用或禁用特定功能。

trans-unit.source: file://<filename>: The referenced file must be present in the CredentialSpecs subdirectory in the docker data directory, which defaults to C:\ProgramData\Docker\ on Windows. For example, specifying file://spec.json loads C:\ProgramData\Docker\CredentialSpecs\spec.json.

trans-unit.source: max_attempts: How many times to attempt to restart a container before giving up (default: never give up). If the restart does not succeed within the configured window, this attempt doesn’t count toward the configured max_attempts value. For example, if max_attempts is set to ‘2’, and the restart fails on the first attempt, more than two restarts may be attempted.
trans-unit.target: max_attempts ：放弃之前尝试重新启动容器的次数（默认值：永不放弃）。如果重新启动在配置的 window 内未成功，则此尝试不会计入配置的 max_attempts 值。例如，如果将 max_attempts 设置为“ 2”，并且第一次尝试重新启动失败，则可能会尝试两次以上的重新启动。

trans-unit.source: max_failure_ratio: Failure rate to tolerate during a rollback (default 0).

trans-unit.source: mode: The permissions for the file that is mounted within the service’s task containers, in octal notation. For instance, 0444 represents world-readable. The default is 0444. Configs cannot be writable because they are mounted in a temporary filesystem, so if you set the writable bit, it is ignored. The executable bit can be set. If you aren’t familiar with UNIX file permission modes, you may find this permissions calculator useful.
trans-unit.target: mode ：服务的任务容器中装入的文件的权限，以八进制表示。例如， 0444 表示世界可读。默认值为 0444 。由于配置文件已挂载在临时文件系统中，因此它们不可写，因此，如果您设置可写位，则会将其忽略。可执行位可以设置。如果您不熟悉UNIX文件权限模式，则可能会发现此权限计算器很有用。

trans-unit.source: mode: The permissions for the file to be mounted in /run/secrets/ in the service’s task containers, in octal notation. For instance, 0444 represents world-readable. The default in Docker 1.13.1 is 0000, but is be 0444 in newer versions. Secrets cannot be writable because they are mounted in a temporary filesystem, so if you set the writable bit, it is ignored. The executable bit can be set. If you aren’t familiar with UNIX file permission modes, you may find this permissions calculator useful.
trans-unit.target: mode ：服务的任务容器中的 /run/secrets/ 中要挂载的文件的权限，以八进制表示法。例如， 0444 表示世界可读。Docker 1.13.1中的默认值为 0000 ，但在较新版本中为 0444 。机密信息不可写，因为它们已安装在临时文件系统中，因此，如果设置了可写位，它将被忽略。可执行位可以设置。如果您不熟悉UNIX文件权限模式，则可能会发现此权限计算器很有用。

trans-unit.source: private: The mount is private. Sub-mounts within it are not exposed to replica mounts, and sub-mounts of replica mounts are not exposed to the original mount.
trans-unit.target: private ：挂载是私有的。其中的子安装不暴露于副本安装，副本安装的子安装也不暴露于原始安装。

trans-unit.source: rprivate: The default. The same as private, meaning that no mount points anywhere within the original or replica mount points propagate in either direction.
trans-unit.target: rprivate ：默认值。与 private 相同，这意味着原始或副本安装点中的任何位置都不会在任何方向传播安装点。

trans-unit.source: rshared: The same as shared, but the propagation also extends to and from mount points nested within any of the original or replica mount points.
trans-unit.target: rshared ：与shared相同，但是传播也扩展到嵌套在任何原始或副本安装点中的安装点以及从这些安装点扩展。

trans-unit.source: rslave: The same as slave, but the propagation also extends to and from mount points nested within any of the original or replica mount points.
trans-unit.target: rslave ：与 slave 相同，但是传播也扩展到嵌套在任何原始或副本安装点中的安装点以及从这些安装点扩展。

trans-unit.source: shared: Sub-mounts of the original mount are exposed to replica mounts, and sub-mounts of replica mounts are also propagated to the original mount.
trans-unit.target: shared ：原始安装的子安装公开给复制安装，复制安装的子安装也传播到原始安装。

trans-unit.source: slave: similar to a shared mount, but only in one direction. If the original mount exposes a sub-mount, the replica mount can see it. However, if the replica mount exposes a sub-mount, the original mount cannot see it.
trans-unit.target: slave ：类似于共享安装，但仅在一个方向上。如果原始安装公开了子安装，则副本安装可以看到它。但是，如果副本安装公开了子安装，则原始安装看不到它。

trans-unit.source: Changing the volume from within the Dockerfile: If any build steps change the data within the volume after it has been declared, those changes will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: 从Dockerfile中更改卷：如果在声明了卷之后有任何构建步骤更改了卷中的数据，则这些更改将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Cluster management integrated with Docker Engine: Use the Docker Engine CLI to create a swarm of Docker Engines where you can deploy application services. You don’t need additional orchestration software to create or manage a swarm.
trans-unit.target: 与Docker Engine集成的集群管理：使用Docker Engine CLI创建大量Docker Engine，您可以在其中部署应用程序服务。您不需要其他编排软件即可创建或管理群体。

trans-unit.source: Decentralized design: Instead of handling differentiation between node roles at deployment time, the Docker Engine handles any specialization at runtime. You can deploy both kinds of nodes, managers and workers, using the Docker Engine. This means you can build an entire swarm from a single disk image.
trans-unit.target: 分散式设计： Docker Engine无需在部署时处理节点角色之间的差异，而在运行时处理任何专业化问题。您可以使用Docker Engine部署节点，管理者和工作者。这意味着您可以从单个磁盘映像构建整个群集。

trans-unit.source: Declarative service model: Docker Engine uses a declarative approach to let you define the desired state of the various services in your application stack. For example, you might describe an application comprised of a web front end service with message queueing services and a database backend.
trans-unit.target: 声明式服务模型： Docker Engine使用声明式方法来定义应用程序堆栈中各种服务的所需状态。例如，您可能描述了一个包含Web前端服务和消息队列服务以及数据库后端的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Denial of Service - An attacker could reject all Notary server requests and corrupt or delete keys from the database (or even delete keys from an HSM), and thus prevent Notary servers from signing generated timestamps or snapshots.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝服务 -攻击者可以拒绝所有公证服务器的请求，并从数据库中破坏或删除密钥（甚至从HSM中删除密钥），从而阻止公证服务器对生成的时间戳或快照进行签名。

trans-unit.source: Denial of Service - An attacker could reject client requests and corrupt or delete metadata from the database, thus preventing clients from the ability to download or upload metadata.
trans-unit.target: 拒绝服务 -攻击者可能拒绝客户端请求，并从数据库中破坏或删除元数据，从而阻止客户端下载或上传元数据。

trans-unit.source: Desired state reconciliation: The swarm manager node constantly monitors the cluster state and reconciles any differences between the actual state and your expressed desired state. For example, if you set up a service to run 10 replicas of a container, and a worker machine hosting two of those replicas crashes, the manager creates two new replicas to replace the replicas that crashed. The swarm manager assigns the new replicas to workers that are running and available.
trans-unit.target: 所需状态协调：群集管理器节点不断监视集群状态，并协调实际状态与您表示的所需状态之间的任何差异。例如，如果您将服务设置为运行一个容器的10个副本，并且承载其中两个副本的工作计算机崩溃，则管理器将创建两个新副本来替换崩溃的副本。群管理器将新副本分配给正在运行且可用的工作程序。

trans-unit.source: Develop, Ship and Run Any Application, Anywhere
trans-unit.target: 随时随地开发，交付和运行任何应用程序
